step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders and elbows close to the target. Try to bring your wrists a little closer to your chest in this step.
Your shoulders and elbows are well-aligned. Focus on opening your fingers wider and extending your arms fully to shoulder height while relaxing your muscles.
Shoulder and elbow alignment is good. For the next repetitions, try to relax your muscles more as you open your fingers and extend your arms.
Shoulders and elbows are mostly in place. Pay close attention to fully extending your arms to shoulder height and relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Your shoulders are well-aligned. For the next repetitions, focus on fully extending your arms to shoulder height and relaxing your muscles. Your elbows and wrists could be straighter.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the arm movements! Remember to fully open your fingers and extend your arms to shoulder height while relaxing your muscles. Keep up the good work!
